project.name: Gentoo-zh
project.description: The Gentoo zh Overlay is a community-maintained Portage overlay for Chinese users, providing additional packages like Chinese input methods (e.g., Fcitx, RIME), localized software, and optimizations. It can be added via layman or eselect repository to extend official Gentoo repositories with Chinese-specific tools and enhancements. Useful for improving Chinese language support in Gentoo Linux.
